content.text:
# List of association football rivalries in the United Kingdom

derby between Celtic and Rangers is one of the greatest in British sports. This image showing the separation of the two fanbases on derby day.]]
This article lists the association football rivalries in the UK.
Football derby matches in the United Kingdom are often heated affairs, and violence is not uncommon. However, the matches and the rivalries they encompass are frequently listed among the best in the sport. A 2008 report showed that West Bromwich Albion vs Wolverhampton Wanderers was the number one rivalry in English football. While Old Firm derby matches between Scottish clubs Rangers and Celtic are known to go beyond the sport with its "enormous quantity of references to wider cultural and political issues". The first football derby played was between Hallam F.C. and Sheffield F.C. in December 1860.
England and Wales
and Liverpool share rivalries between them which gave birth to the North West Derby between Manchester United and Liverpool.]]
"Eternal derbies"
There are six clubs that have played in every season of the Premier League, the highest level of the English football pyramid, since 1992 so far: Arsenal, Chelsea, Everton, Liverpool, Manchester United and Tottenham Hotspur. These matches contain some of the most notable derbies between each other.
Greater London
*Arsenal-Chelsea rivalry: Arsenal vs. Chelsea
*Chelsea-Tottenham Hotspur rivalry: Chelsea vs. Tottenham Hotspur
*North London derby: Arsenal vs. Tottenham Hotspur
North-West England and Yorkshire
* Merseyside derby: Everton vs. Liverpool
*Northwest derby: Liverpool vs. Manchester United
*Everton-Manchester United rivalry: Everton vs. Manchester United
Inter-regional
* London-Liverpool rivalries:
** Arsenal-Liverpool rivalry: Arsenal vs. Liverpool
**Chelsea-Liverpool rivalry: Chelsea vs. Liverpool
**Liverpool vs. Tottenham Hotspur
**Everton vs. Arsenal/Chelsea/Tottenham Hotspur.
* London-Manchester rivalries:
**Arsenal-Manchester United rivalry: Arsenal vs. Manchester United
**Chelsea-Manchester United rivalry: Chelsea vs. Manchester United
**Manchester United vs. Tottenham Hotspur
Central England

*Suffolk derby:
**Bury Town vs. Sudbury

**Lowestoft Town vs. Needham Market

Scotland
match in 2008]]
*The "eternal derbies" of the Scottish Premiership consist of all combinations of Celtic, Rangers, Aberdeen and Motherwell, which all have not been relegated since their first season in this top-level league, which succeded Scottish Premier League in 2013, as of , including the Old Firm, which is the rivalry between Celtic and Rangers.
*Angus derby: any combination of Arbroath, Brechin City, Forfar Athletic and Montrose
*Ayrshire derby: Ayr United vs. Kilmarnock
*Dundee derby: Dundee vs. Dundee United
*Edinburgh derby: Heart of Midlothian vs. Hibernian
*Falkirk derby: East Stirlingshire vs. Falkirk
*Fife derby: any combination of Dunfermline Athletic, Raith Rovers, Cowdenbeath and East Fife
*Highland derby: Inverness Caledonian Thistle vs. Ross County
*Lanarkshire derby: any combination of Airdrieonians, Albion Rovers, Hamilton Academical and Motherwell
*North derby: Aberdeen v Inverness Caledonian Thistle
*New Firm: Aberdeen vs. Dundee United
*Original Glasgow derby: Queen's Park vs. Rangers
*Renfrewshire derby: Greenock Morton vs. St Mirren
*Tayside derby: St Johnstone vs. Dundee or Dundee United
*East lothian Derby: Any combination of Tranent FC, Haddington athletic, Dunbar united, Musselburgh Athletic, Preston Athletic
